parts.text: {"word":"enter","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(場所・建物などに)入る、入場する","english_definition":"to come or go into (a place).","examples":[{"sentence":"She entered the room quietly.","translation":"彼女は静かに部屋に入った。"},{"sentence":"Please enter your password.","translation":"パスワードを入力してください。"},{"sentence":"The train entered the tunnel.","translation":"列車はトンネルに入った。"}],"collocations":["enter a room (部屋に入る)","enter a building (建物に入る)","enter a competition (競技会に参加する)","enter a country (国に入る)","enter a market (市場に参入する)","enter into an agreement (合意に至る)"],"synonyms":["go in","come in","get in","infiltrate","penetrate","invade"],"antonyms":["exit","leave","depart"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(データ・情報など)を入力する、記入する","english_definition":""to type (information) into a computer or other device."","examples":[{"sentence":"Enter your name and address.","translation":"あなたの名前と住所を入力してください。"},{"sentence":"I entered the data into the spreadsheet.","translation":"私はデータをスプレッドシートに入力した。"}],"collocations":["enter data (データを入力する)","enter information (情報を入力する)","enter a code (コードを入力する)","enter details (詳細を入力する)"],"synonyms":["input","key in","type in","record","register"],"antonyms":["delete","erase"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(競技会・試験などに)参加する、出場する","english_definition":""to take part in (a competition, examination, etc.)."","examples":[{"sentence":"He entered the marathon for the first time.","translation":"彼は初めてマラソンに参加した。"},{"sentence":"She entered the talent show.","translation":"彼女はタレントショーに出場した。"}],"collocations":["enter a competition (競技会に参加する)","enter a race (レースに出場する)","enter a contest (コンテストに参加する)","enter an exam (試験を受ける)"],"synonyms":["join","participate in","compete in","take part in","enrol in"],"antonyms":["withdraw from","drop out of"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(状態・状況などに)入る、陥る","english_definition":""to begin to be in (a state or situation)."","examples":[{"sentence":"They entered a period of economic decline.","translation":"彼らは経済衰退の時期に入った。"},{"sentence":"The country entered a state of war.","translation":"その国は戦争状態に入った。"}],"collocations":["enter a state (状態に入る)","enter a phase (段階に入る)","enter a period (期間に入る)","enter a partnership (提携関係に入る)","enter into a discussion (議論に入る)"],"synonyms":["begin","start","commence","embark on","fall into"],"antonyms":["end","finish","conclude"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(契約・合意などに)署名する、締結する","english_definition":""to sign or become a party to (a contract, agreement, etc.)."","examples":[{"sentence":"The two companies entered into a partnership.","translation":"その2社は提携関係を結んだ。"},{"sentence":"We entered into an agreement with them.","translation":"私たちは彼らと合意に至った。"}],"collocations":["enter into an agreement (合意に至る)","enter into a contract (契約を締結する)","enter into negotiations (交渉に入る)"],"synonyms":["conclude","execute","ratify","undertake","commit to"],"antonyms":["cancel","rescind","terminate"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"入ること、入場、参入、入力","english_definition":""the act of entering; the right or opportunity to enter; an item of information entered in a book, list, or computer."","examples":[{"sentence":"The entrance fee is $10.","translation":"入場料は10ドルです。"},{"sentence":"She made a dramatic entrance.","translation":"彼女は劇的な登場をした。"},{"sentence":"There are several entries in the dictionary for the word 'run'.","translation":"辞書には「run」という単語の項目がいくつかある。"}],"collocations":["point of entry (侵入地点)","right of entry (立ち入り権)","entrance fee (入場料)","data entry (データ入力)","dictionary entry (辞書の項目)"],"synonyms":["access","admission","ingress","accession","introduction"],"antonyms":["exit","departure","egress"]}],"etymology":{"value":"古フランス語の「entrer」（入る）から派生し、さらにラテン語の「intrare」（中に入る）に由来する。ラテン語の「intra」（内側に）が語源。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈentər/","syllables":"en-ter"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["enter","enters"],"past_simple":"entered","past_participle":"entered","present_participle":"entering"},"noun_plural":"entries"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**enter**」は、物理的な場所への移動から、抽象的な状態や活動への参加まで、幅広い意味を持つ動詞です。自動詞としては「入る」、他動詞としては「入力する」「参加する」といった意味で使われます。名詞としては「入ること」「入場」「項目」などの意味があります。文脈によって意味が大きく異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ He entered to the room.","correct":"✓ He entered the room.","note":"「enter」は他動詞なので、前置詞「to」は不要です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ Please entry your password.","correct":"✓ Please enter your password.","note":"「entry」は名詞で、「enter」が動詞です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ I'm entering at the competition.","correct":"✓ I'm entering the competition.","note":"競技会に参加する場合は、「enter the competition」が正しい表現です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["entrance (名詞: 入り口、入場)","entry (名詞: 入ること、項目、参加)","entrant (名詞: 新入生、参加者)"],"phrasal_verbs":["enter into (～を始める、～に参加する、～を締結する)","enter on/upon (～を始める、～に着手する)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"A2 (基本的な「入る」の意味)、B1 (他の意味)","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度 (High frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"A2","text":"「**enter**」は、場所や建物に「入る」という意味の一般的な単語です。例えば、「Please **enter** the building.（建物に入ってください）」のように使います。また、コンピューターに情報を「入力する」という意味もあります。「**enter** your password（パスワードを入力してください）」のように使います。競技などに「参加する」という意味もあります。名詞の「entrance」は「入り口」という意味です。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The cat **entered** the garden through a hole in the fence.","translation":"猫は塀の穴を通って庭に入った。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"入る"},{"sentence":"Please **enter** the code to unlock the door.","translation":"ドアのロックを解除するためにコードを入力してください。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"入力する"},{"sentence":"She decided to **enter** the singing contest.","translation":"彼女は歌のコンテストに参加することに決めた。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"参加する"},{"sentence":"The company **entered** a new market last year.","translation":"その会社は昨年、新しい市場に参入した。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"参入する"},{"sentence":"They **entered** into a formal agreement.","translation":"彼らは正式な合意を締結した。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"締結する"},{"sentence":"His **entry** in the competition was very impressive.","translation":"彼の競技会への参加は非常に印象的だった。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"参加"}]}
